hand_rankings.name: Royal Flush
hand_rankings.description: Ace, King, Queen, Jack, and Ten, all of the same suit.

hand_rankings.name: Straight Flush
hand_rankings.description: Five cards in sequence, all of the same suit. A Royal Flush is the highest possible Straight Flush.

hand_rankings.name: Four of a Kind
hand_rankings.description: Four cards of the same rank.

hand_rankings.name: Full House
hand_rankings.description: Three cards of one rank and two cards of another rank.

hand_rankings.name: Flush
hand_rankings.description: Five cards of the same suit, not in sequence.

hand_rankings.name: Straight
hand_rankings.description: Five cards in sequence, but not of the same suit.

hand_rankings.name: Three of a Kind
hand_rankings.description: Three cards of the same rank.

hand_rankings.name: Two Pair
hand_rankings.description: Two separate pairs of cards of the same rank.

hand_rankings.name: One Pair
hand_rankings.description: Two cards of the same rank.

hand_rankings.name: High Card
hand_rankings.description: When a hand does not meet any of the higher ranking combinations, the highest card determines the rank.
